caption:
This photograph captures a vibrant nighttime scene along a commercial street. The main focus is on the brightly lit signs along the roadside.

On the left, there is a prominent sign that reads "PALM READER & ADVISOR" highlighted by surrounding light bulbs; it has an image of a palm, suggesting a business offering palmistry services. The light from this sign is reflected on the hood and windshield of a car parked on the street, capturing the same palm and text in reverse on the reflective surface.

The streetscape extends towards the right, with a long exposure capturing the red and white light streaks of passing vehicles, creating a dynamic sense of movement on the road.

Further down the street, other illuminated signs are visible, advertising various businesses like drive-ins and diners. The night sky is dark, contrasting sharply against the artificial lights.

Overall, the scene captures a typical bustling American street at night, highlighted by the glow of neon signs and the life of the city reflected in the motion of traffic.
title: Streaks from autoMobile lights on "the strip" at night beginning at bagnell dam, "the strip" winds for a mile or so along the ridge tops to the south
placename: Ozarks, Lake of the, State Park (Mo.)
location: Ozarks, Lake of the, State Park, Missouri
